q: old glamour shot of Betty White in what we imagine is the early 1940s-- woo woo, she was a looker. When asked if she's going to do "SNL" again, Betty White quips, I think you do a thing once and then you run like a thief. David Letterman then asks her what she does in her free time and Betty White says, "Oh, I like to do most anything. Play with animals, mostly. And vodka's kind of a hobby

Chris Bryant, who believes he may have been a victim of the phone hackers, said Friday he welcomed the decision to re-examine the case, adding that it should not have been closed last month. The evidence that this goes far deeper than one rotten apple has continued to stack up, and so a fresh pair of eyes looking at the case is very welcome, he said. Bryant said the police had "severely" damaged their credibility by failing to properly investigate earlier. Andy Coulson and the News of The World have denied the charges. THQ

SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as "shyster loans." Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, CEO Sergio Marchionne said in a statement. "I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate." Shyster is a derogatory term used to describe an unprincipled lawyer or politician. He used the term at least

Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are "very routine" for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings. Previous article Grand jury
